High Thruput #COVID19 sera testing for neut activity possible with 2G surrogate Virus Neut Assay (VNA); 1G VNA can test up to 100 samples a day (8 dilutions x 4 replicates x100 = 3,200 infections). 2G VNA (add, walk away, no lysis protocol) can test >10X more with automation.
